node.title: Meet the politician more powerful than Biden and Trump: 'I wouldn't wish this upon anyone'
node.description: Joe Manchin spent more than a decade being largely ignored in the US Senate. Then a twist of fate turned him into America's most influential politician.
node.content:
["He may not be the most famous Joe in American politics, but Senator Joe Manchin\u00a0is quickly becoming the most infamous.", "The Democrat from West Virginia, a mountainous state known for its coal-mining industry, currently wields outsized influence in Washington\u00a0DC, where he holds the deciding vote in an evenly split Senate.", "In recent weeks, Senator Manchin and his Senate colleague from Arizona,\u00a0Kyrsten Sinema,\u00a0have single-handedly whittled down their party's ambitious agenda by more than half.", "The $US6 trillion social spending plan\u00a0which was the backbone of Joe Biden's pitch for the presidency\u00a0is now a slimmed-down\u00a0$US1.75 trillion \"framework\"\u00a0without key measures to tackle climate change.", "Paid parental leave, lower prescription drug prices and free community college are also likely casualties of ongoing negotiations.", "Senator Manchin said his concerns simply reflected those\u00a0of most Americans.\u00a0", "\"We can't go too far left,\" he recently told CNN.", "\"This is not a centre-left or a left country. We are, if anything, a centre-right country.\"\u00a0", "Now the plan has been decoupled from the bipartisan infrastructure bill he helped write, Senator Manchin has even less incentive to support it,\u00a0and has cited\u00a0rising inflation\u00a0and cost-of-living concerns as\u00a0reasons\u00a0not to.", "Still, the 74-year-old senator\u00a0insists\u00a0he does not enjoy being the deciding vote in nearly every major policy decision in the United States.", "\"I wouldn't wish this [position] upon anyone,\" he said\u00a0during a recent interview.", "But his critics argue he is relishing his new-found clout.", "", "
Progressive Democrats are frustrated with Joe Manchin for holding up their legislative agenda.\u00a0(Reuters:\u00a0Jonathan Ernst)
", "A conservative among progressives and a lone Democrat from a solidly\u00a0Republican\u00a0state, Senator Manchin's true motivations often get lost behind\u00a0the novelty of his character.", "But his recent ascension to national notoriety \u2013 propelled by murky corporate donations \u2013 has brought fresh scrutiny to what drives him.", "So, what does\u00a0a man who lives on a luxury yacht while representing one of the poorest states in the country actually want?", "
The son of a local mayor grows up to be kingmaker
", "Joseph Manchin III grew up in Farmington, West Virginia, a tiny coal-mining town where his father and grandfather both served as mayor.", "In the late 1980s, he founded a series of lucrative coal companies, then handed the reins to his own son and pivoted to politics.", "In 2005, he became state governor \u2014\u00a0a role he held until 2010 when he was elected to the US Senate on a gun-toting platform that literally took aim at president Barack Obama's signature policies.", "Senator Manchin \u2014 who describes himself as \"fiscally conservative and socially compassionate\" \u2014 has always been to the right of the Democratic Party.", "His Republican-style obsession with small government, pared-back social services and gun rights is often read as a reflection of the state he represents, which voted overwhelmingly for Donald Trump in 2016 and 2020.", "The more cynical view is he's in it for himself.", "\"Senator Joe Manchin is a walking conflict of interest,\" said Craig Holman, a lobbyist specialising in government ethics for non-profit watchdog Public Citizen.", "\"And it shows up in his efforts to try to sabotage the clean climate policies of President Biden.", "Senator Manchin, who chairs the Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources, is the sole reason a program to rapidly replace coal- and gas-fired power plants with wind, solar and nuclear energy was cut from the Build Back Better plan.", "The 50-50 split in the Senate, however, means he \u2014\u00a0or another senator \u2014 can essentially veto the Democrats' entire agenda.", "\"That puts him in a far more powerful position than even President Biden or anyone else,\"\u00a0Mr Holman said.", "\"And he is exercising that undue influence.\"", "
How does Joe Manchin make\u00a0millions from coal without losing his job?\u00a0
", "Senator\u00a0Manchin is not in violation of US Senate rules, because his son runs his two coal brokerage companies.", "But he remains a shareholder.\u00a0", "", "
Joe Manchin\u00a0says America is a \"centre-right\u00a0nation\".\u00a0(Reuters:\u00a0Evelyn Hockstein)
", "Since 2011,\u00a0he has personally made around $US5 million from coal, and last year earned more than $US500,000 from one of his firms, Enersystems, which buys waste coal from mines to sell to power plants for fuel.", "By comparison, a US senator typically makes $US174,000 a year.", "Mr Boguslaw spent months mapping what he dubbed the senator's \"dirty empire\", using public records to show the human and environmental impacts of the senator's sprawling private\u00a0enterprise.", "Any\u00a0characterisation of Senator Manchin as an impartial \"moderate\"\u00a0is deeply flawed, Mr Boguslaw argues, given he receives more fossil fuel donations than any other member of Congress.", "Instead, he pins Senator Manchin's motivations on three things: Corporate donations, an amorphous centrist\u00a0ideology, and\u00a0his family's ambition\u00a0to create a political dynasty in the mould of the Kennedys.", "\"[Democrats] concocted this myth around him that his moderation and his ability to take money from all these extractive industries is what has preserved his power and made him a critical voice [in Washington],\" he said.", "It's worth noting West Virginians consistently voted for Democratic presidential candidates\u00a0up until the 2000s.", "Senator Manchin's office declined to comment.", "
What do West Virginians think of their senator?
", "Progressive Democrats have openly vented their frustrations with Senator Manchin's refusal to support the party's agenda, despite its popularity, even among\u00a0West Virginians who voted for Trump.", "But he continues to argue he doesn't want to foster a culture of \"entitlement\" nor saddle his 10 grandchildren with\u00a0debt.", "", "
Local polling shows about\u00a042 per cent of West Virginians\u00a0approve of Senator Manchin, while 37 per cent say they disapprove.(AP:\u00a0J. Scott Applewhite)
", "\"We're not asking for a handout. What we're wanting is a hand up,\" said Pam Garrison, co-chair of the West Virginia Poor People's Campaign advocacy group.", "\"You talk about your grandchildren's future\u00a0\u2014 what about my grandchildren's future?", "\"What kind of world are you going to leave them?\"", "Ms Garrison \u2014 whose father, grandfather and husband worked as coal miners \u2014\u00a0raised two kids on a shop worker's\u00a0wage and\u00a0says Senator Manchin is wilfully blind to the realities of working people in his home state, where the poverty rate was at 16 per cent\u00a0prior to the pandemic.", "In October, a group of West Virginians was so desperate to speak to the senator they kayaked up to the 12-metre yacht he sleeps on while he's working on Capitol Hill.", "\"It's like every which way we go, we hit a brick wall that the government has put up for us to hit. And they're standing there, hollering, 'We're doing this for your own good,'\" Ms Garrison said.", "Recently, when asked\u00a0if his refusal to pass the social spending bill was making him\u00a0less popular at home, Senator\u00a0Manchin\u00a0quipped: \u201cIt depends on what corner of town you go to.\"\u00a0"]
